bundle.shortDescription: Group file sharing with granular access control
bundle.longDescription: WRAITH Share enables secure group file sharing with granular access control. Create shared folders, invite members, and set read/write permissions - all without central servers. End-to-end encrypted with activity logging and file versioning.
